text:
<@U024K88ECFN> have gone through the same situation. Recently, I have removed all my connection that belong to marketing industry. It's true that most of the marketers engage on marketers posts. It is the reason we see they have good organic reach and engagement.

Second thing is that there are CEO's are service seekers active there. But only thing is that how do you put them to engage with your content. Don't post marketing content. Instead go for informative content that looks problem solving try putting stats and sound like a problem solver. This type of content is least engaged but it will generate clients for you.

So remove all marketing connections and go for your prospects. It's proven after doing that I am getting messages from my prospects that I have connected with recently.
